Class Item

java.lang.Object
src.recomanador.domini.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Item extends Object implements Comparable<Item>
Classe represent un item d'un conjunt items

  • Field Details

    • pesos

      private static ArrayList<Float> pesos
      Array with the weights of each attribute. The default value is null

    • tipusAtribut

      private static ArrayList<Item.tipus> tipusAtribut
      Array with the weights of each attribute. I and N should be unique

    • nomAtribut

      private static ArrayList<String> nomAtribut
      Array with the names of of each attribute.

    • id

      private static int id
      Position of the attribute id at the array of types "tipusAtribut"

    • nomA

      private static int nomA
      Position of the attribute that represents tha name of an item at the array of types "tipusAtribut" -1 if the index doesn't exist

    • atributs

      private ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> atributs
      ArrayList where each attribute has its own vector. An attribute can be empty

      public static void inicialitzarStatics(ArrayList<Float> pesos, ArrayList<String> nomAtributs, ArrayList<Item.tipus> tipusAtribut, int id, int nomA) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Initializes the static values with the ones given.
      Parameters:
      pesos - Atribute weights
      nomAtributs - Atribute names
      tipusAtribut - Atribute types
      id - Id position
      nomA - name position
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - The types where not valid.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException - posId is already defined or is an invalid column.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemStaticValuesAlreadyInitializedException - Values were already initialized.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException - The atribute weights were not valid.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Item otherItem)
      Function that overrides the compareTo by defalut. Compares 2 items by their id's
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Item>
      Parameters:
      otherItem - The other item that compares
      Returns:
      Returns an integer depending on the comparisson between the implicit item and the item given as a parameter
      1 if implicit > otherItem
      0 if implicit = otherItem
      -1 if implicit < otherItem
